section.heading: Statement of denial.
section.text: A partner or other person named as a partner in a filed statement of partnership authority or in a list maintained by an agent pursuant to § 29-603.03(b) may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of denial stating the name of the partnership and the fact that is being denied, which may include denial of a person’s authority or status as a partner. A statement of denial shall be a limitation on authority as provided in § 29-603.03(d) and (e).

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted “deliver to the Mayor for filing” for “file.”
annotations.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 304 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act).
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
